lom:description.lom:string: "The links below are organized around the sequence of topics typically taught in an introductory earth science or physical geography class. Links are also available for environmental science,earth science/geography education, career opportunities, and more. The sites selected are based on image quality, ease with which lesson plans can be developed, organization, authenticity, scope, and format." * Earth science * Environmental science * Other resource links

lom:title.lom:string: Resources for earth science and geography instruction
